rooms.description: Spacious living area with Art Deco inspired interior design featuring geometric patterns and metallic accents. Vastu compliant positioning to welcome positive energy.
Adjacent dining room that seamlessly connects with the living area for social gatherings. Placement ensures alignment with Vastu principles for auspicious flow of energy.
Modern kitchen incorporating contemporary appliances and Art Deco styling. Kitchen is positioned towards the south-eastern direction as per Vastu for cooking and fire element.
Luxurious master bedroom with Art Deco decor and ample natural light. Located in the north-east to enhance prosperity as per Vastu guidelines.
Guest bedroom designed with comfortable seating area and Art Deco elegance. Placed towards the south-west for calmness and relaxation.
Full bathroom with fixtures that reflect the farmhouse's aesthetic, ensuring privacy and adherence to Vastu principles regarding water placement.
Dedicated gym area integrated into the ground floor design with Art Deco accents. Equipped with modern fitness equipment and placed in a south-western corner to promote discipline.
Utility room for storage and housekeeping tasks, designed keeping Vastu in mind by aligning with the north-east direction.

openings.description: Main entrance door facing east to welcome positive energy as per Vastu principles. Decorated with Art Deco detailing.
Floor-to-ceiling windows in the living area to maximize natural light and ventilation.
Large window facing north for optimum daylight and a view of the surroundings.
Balcony door providing access to the rooftop terrace from the living area.
